SITE.title: Qantto - Online Quote Generator
SITE.description: Online quote generator for auto, home, life insurance, and more. Quote, compare, and purchase online.
SITE.keywords: insurance, quote, online, auto, home, life, personal accident, travel, pets, commercial, liability, surety, retirement

HERO.title: Automatic 24/7 Quotes for Your Clients
HERO.description: Enable your potential clients to obtain quotes for your products or services in minutes.

FEATURES1.title: Unlike any other tool you've used before
FEATURES1.description: Qantto allows you to generate personalized quotes automatically for your clients in real time, easily, 24/7.

list.one: View your prospects in real time.

one.name: Carlos Jimenez
one.quote: Since I started using Qantto, my service quoting process has become incredibly easy and fast. The platform is intuitive and allows me to generate professional quotes in a matter of minutes. Now, I can dedicate more time to serving my clients and growing my business. Thank you, Qantto!

two.name: Camila Soto
two.quote: Qantto has revolutionized the way I manage my service quotations. Before, I would spend hours calculating costs and creating documents. With Qantto, everything is done automatically, saving me time and effort. Additionally, the accuracy of the quotations has helped me improve my profitability and avoid costly mistakes. I recommend Qantto to all entrepreneurs and professionals who want to simplify their quotation process.

three.name: Andrés Pérez
three.quote: Qantto is an essential tool for my business. The ability to create quotations 24/7 allows me to respond quickly to my clients' requests. The platform is user-friendly and customizable, allowing me to tailor the quotations to each client's specific needs. I am delighted with the results I have achieved thanks to Qantto, and I can't imagine my business without this valuable tool.

one.question: What is Qantto?
one.answer:
At Qantto, we understand that quoting products and services can be a complicated task and consume many technological and human resources. That's why we have created a technological tool that allows you to customize every aspect of the quotation and generate hundreds of proposals automatically and efficiently, in real time, 24/7.

Our application is designed to help companies, businesses, and individuals save time and money in the quoting process, eliminating the need for a large sales team and allowing you to focus on what matters most: closing the sale.

two.question: How does it work?
two.answer:
Imagine being able to provide your customers with personalized and automatic quotes, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Without having to invest in sales personnel and spend hours on quoting tasks. With Qantto, this dream becomes a reality.

The process is easy and fast.

You don't need technical knowledge. With the following simple steps, you can get started. It will only take you 5 minutes.

First: create an account and select a plan. You will always have the free plan available. We don't ask for credit card information.

Second: customize the landing page where your customers will go to request a quote. For example, qantto.io/mycompany. Provide your company name, a description, and the logo.

Third: create the services and sub-services you offer. Configure the pricing parameters for each option.

Fourth: share the link generated by the platform with your customers. That's it! Now your customers can create automatic quotes and receive real-time estimates, without you or your sales team having to spend valuable hours on the task. Instead, focus on your potential customers and closing deals.

three.question: Why choose us?
three.answer: With Qantto, you can save time and money in the quoting process, allowing you to focus on growing your business. Our application is user-friendly, fully customizable, and best of all, automated. This allows you to tailor it to the specific needs of your business and your clients. Additionally, we provide technical support and personalized guidance to assist you throughout the implementation process. Don't wait any longer, join Qantto and save valuable time and resources for your organization.

four.question: How is the tool customized for my business?
four.answer:
Step by step:

1. Create an account and select a plan: As a customer, you need to create an account on Qantto and choose the plan that best suits your needs. You can opt for a paid plan or use the free option to test the tool.

2. Customize the platform: Once registered with an active plan, you can customize the tool according to your business. You can add your brand, a company description, and configure the services you offer.

3. Set up service parameters and features: For each service, the user can configure specific parameters or features, such as materials used, estimated time, required quantity, among others. These parameters will help calculate the value of each service.

4. Validate the final costs: After configuring the questions and services, the user can validate the final costs of the services provided by Qantto. This will allow them to have a clear view of the prices and make adjustments if necessary.

5. Save the configuration and share the link: Once the customization is complete, the user can save the configuration and generate a unique link to share with their customers. This will allow them to access the tool and start quoting the offered services.

five.question: Do I need technical knowledge or third-party involvement to use it?
five.answer: No, advanced technical knowledge or the intervention of third parties is not required to use Qantto. The initial setup process involves defining the options and possible responses for each question and assigning them a value (price). This configuration can be done by the business owner or the salesperson in charge. Once this initial setup is complete, you can use Qantto autonomously without the need for additional technical knowledge.

six.question: How does the tool ensure that the provided quote is accurate and reliable?
six.answer:
Qantto is based on the configuration made by the user to calculate the quote for each service according to the established requirements. The user has the ability to configure their own prices and specify the necessary details for each project.

However, it is important to note that each project is unique and may have additional specific requirements. As a result, the value provided by the tool is an estimate and could vary up to 20% depending on the individual requirements.

seven.question: What security measures are taken to protect my clients' data?
seven.answer: We take security measures to protect customer data. Data encryption, restricted access, data backup and recovery, protection against threats and vulnerabilities, and compliance with data protection regulations are implemented. These measures ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of customer information.

eight.question: What type of technical support or advice is provided after the implementation of the tool?
eight.answer: We provide a robust technical support service and guidance after the tool's implementation. Our support team is available to assist you with any technical inquiries or issues you may encounter. Additionally, we have expert advisors who will provide guidance in tool configuration and help you optimize your processes. We are committed to offering comprehensive service to ensure your success with Qantto.

nine.question: What if my business has specific requirements that cannot be covered by the tool?
nine.answer:
Although the tool offers extensive customization, we understand that every business is unique and may have specific requirements.

In situations where the specific requirements of your business cannot be directly covered by the tool, we offer customized solutions. Our team of experts is available to assess your needs and work with you to find a solution that fits your business in a personalized manner.

Whether through further customization of the existing tool or the development of new functionalities, we will strive to meet your specific requirements and ensure that you obtain the maximum value from our platform.

ten.question: How does the tool integrate with other systems or platforms that I am already using?
ten.answer: Qantto allows you to redirect your customers to other links of tools you use for your business, such as Calendly, WhatsApp, or your website.
